item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Lavanya add a quote by Tagore
item.description: "I slept and dreamt that life was joy. I awoke and saw that life was service. I acted and behold, service was joy." -- Tagore

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Lao Tzu
item.description: "Be content with what you have; rejoice in the way things are. When you realize there is nothing lacking, the whole world belongs to you." -- Lao Tzu

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Mick Jagger
item.description: "You can't always get what you want, but if you try sometimes, you might find, you get what you need." -- Mick Jagger

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Simone de Beauvoir
item.description: "One's life has value so long as one attributes value to the life of others, by means of love, friendship, and compassion" -- Simone de Beauvoir

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "In love, no one can harm anyone else; we are each of us responsible for our own feelings and cannot blame someone else for what we feel. It hurt when I lost each of the various men I fell in love with. Now, though, I am convinced that no one loses anyone, because no one owns anyone. That is the true experience of freedom: having the most important thing in the world without owning it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by George Washington Burnap
item.description: "Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for." -- George Washington Burnap

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Khalil Gibran
item.description: "Let there be spaces in your togetherness, And let the winds of the heavens dance between you. Love one another but make not a bond of love: Let it rather be a moving sea between the shores of your souls. Fill each other's cup but drink not from one cup. Give one another of your bread but eat not from the same loaf. Sing and dance together and be joyous, but let each one of you be alone, Even as the strings of a lute are alone though they quiver with the same music. Give your hearts, but not into each other's keeping. For only the hand of Life can contain your hearts. And stand together, yet not too near together: For the pillars of the temple stand apart, And the oak tree and the cypress grow not in each other's shadow." -- Khalil Gibran

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Don Miguel Ruiz
item.description: "Don't take anything Personally Nothing others do is because of you. What others say and do is a projection of their own reality, their own dream. When you are immune to the opinions and actions of others, you won't be the victim of needless suffering" -- Don Miguel Ruiz

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Jeff Corwin
item.description: "I think a human animal is far more wild and unpredictable and dangerous and destructive than any other animal." -- Jeff Corwin

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description:
"The Road Not Taken
Two roads diverged in a yellow wood, And sorry I could not travel both And be one traveler, long I stood And looked down one as far as I could To where it bent in the undergrowth;
Then took the other, as just as fair, And having perhaps the better claim, Because it was grassy and wanted wear; Though as for that the passing there Had worn them really about the same,
And both that morning equally lay In leaves no step had trodden black. Oh, I kept the first for another day! Yet knowing how way leads on to way, I doubted if I should ever come back.
I shall be telling this with a sigh Somewhere ages and ages hence: Two roads diverged in a wood, and Iâ€” I took the one less traveled by, And that has made all the difference." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by St. Augustine
item.description: "The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page." -- St. Augustine

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Always forgive your enemies; nothing annoys them so much." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Jon Krakauer
item.description: "HAPPINESS [is] ONLY REAL WHEN SHARED" -- Jon Krakauer

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Charlotte Kasl
item.description: "The only sure path is to live consciously, moment to moment, as you let go of the outcome." -- Charlotte Kasl

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Margaret Mead
item.description: "Never doubt that a small group of thoughtful, committed, citizens can change the world. Indeed, it is the only thing that ever has." -- Margaret Mead

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Lavanya add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt
